DOC.brief_summary: This study examine whether dietary-induced reduction lipoprotein-associated phospholipase A2 ( Lp-PLA2 ) activity peripheral blood mononuclear cell ( PBMC ) plasma affect metabolic profile PBMCs plasma .
DOC.brief_title: Dietary Intervention Replacing Carbohydrate With Protein Fat Has Greater Effect Peripheral Blood Mononuclear Cell Metabolites Than Plasma Metabolites Patients With Prediabetes Type-2 Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: Eighty nonobese patient ( age 40-70 year ) prediabetes newly diagnose type-2 diabetes randomly assign control group ( normal diet refine rice ) whole-grain group ( replacement refine rice whole-grains legume ) . This dietary intervention replace approximately 7 % carbohydrate-derived energy approximately 4 % protein-derived energy approximately 3 % fat-derived energy .
DOC.criteria: subject IFG ( 100≤ fast glucose < 126 mg/dL ) newly diagnose type2 diabetes ( fast glucose ≥126 mg/dL ) current and/or past history cardiovascular disease include angina liver kidney dysfunction thyroid pituitary disease pregnancy lactation take medication supplement
